channel.title: Oblivion - Original Near-Reality Source!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/iQGlKXc.png[/img] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FBEiZr1ibfM[/youtube]
[b]What is Oblivion?[/b] [i]We are a 317 Server based off the original Near Reality source, this server contains all the nostalgic Near-Reality features but is also still developed. We host Oblivion on a stable VPS that is online 24/7. Our idea of a good server is a server that has something unique to offer, something new and refreshing for the players. [/i]
[b]Website:[/b] [i]http://oblivion-ps.com/[/i] [b]Download link:[/b] [i]http://oblivion-ps.com/index.php?/topic/3-client-download-links/[/i]
[b]Our Features:[/b]
[ul][li][i]- Active pking - Active clan wars - All Bosses (currently OSRS Bosees are being added) - Great and fun Bosses system (Team up with your clan and get multipile loot, the best clan wins it all) - Frequent updates - Gambling - Full Duel Arena (with dds-only and same weapon options) - Stable 24/7 DDOS protected VPS - All skills work - Castle wars - Bloodlust - Achievements - Original Near-reality source is used! - New items - All NR Customs - Easy but fun Money making methods - Custom Minigames[/i][/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[/center]

item.title: Oblivion - Original Near-Reality Source!
item.dc:creator: @hely hely
item.description:
@hely wrote:

[center]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FBEiZr1ibfM[/youtube]

What is Oblivion?
We are a 317 Server based off the original Near Reality source, this server contains all the nostalgic Near-Reality features but is also still developed. We host Oblivion on a stable VPS that is online 24/7. Our idea of a good server is a server that has something unique to offer, something new and refreshing for the players.

Website:
http://oblivion-ps.com/
Download link:
http://oblivion-ps.com/index.php?/topic/3-client-download-links/

Our Features:

[ul][li][i]- Active pking

  • Active clan wars
  • All Bosses (currently OSRS Bosees are being added)
  • Great and fun Bosses system (Team up with your clan and get multipile loot, the best clan wins it all)
  • Frequent updates
  • Gambling
  • Full Duel Arena (with dds-only and same weapon options)
  • Stable 24/7 DDOS protected VPS
  • All skills work
  • Castle wars
  • Bloodlust
  • Achievements
  • Original Near-reality source is used!
  • New items
  • All NR Customs
  • Easy but fun Money making methods
  • Custom Minigames[/i][/li]
    [li][/li][/ul]

[/center]
